summary: The diff does not provide sufficient evidence that the requested placeholder "Map" (with visible "2D" mark) button was added next to the existing "Flying" button in Travelogue journey cards, nor that it is a click no-op. Two ancillary/non-product files were modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the Travelogue UI, add a new button labeled "Map" immediately to the right of the existing "Flying" button wherever the Flying button is rendered, and include a visible "2D" logo/icon mark alongside the label.
missing_requirements.reason: TraveloguePanel.tsx is truncated in the diff summary and does not show any added/updated JSX for a "Map" button, its position relative to "Flying", or the presence of a "2D" mark.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the new "Map" button is a no-op placeholder: clicking it must not navigate, open dialogs, trigger toasts, call backend APIs, or otherwise change application/UI state beyond normal press visuals.
missing_requirements.reason: No onClick handler (or lack thereof) for a new "Map" button is visible in the truncated TraveloguePanel.tsx diff, so the no-op behavior cannot be verified from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state tracking updates indicating the feature is "pending" and summarizing the Map button change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked for a UI change; it did not request modifying/adding project tracking metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to repository documentation/summary text describing multiple unrelated frontend changes (search UI, map icons, admin panel calendar, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to adding a placeholder Map button in Travelogue; modifying a broad frontend file summary is not requested and appears unrelated to the specified change.
